text:
Alyson is very warm and welcoming.  She has so much knowledge about places to go in Austin and she provided us with relevant information and maps for our Austin adventures. Alyson was so accommodating and willing to work with my group's plans...even with some last minute changes.

Her space was very relaxing and peaceful! It was in such a beautiful (email hidden) friends and I were shocked.  I would recommend her space to anyone looking for a location that is relaxing, beautiful and close to downtown Austin and Zilker Park.  Don't let her beautiful space pass you by!
title: Lotus House Queen Bed/Bath Beauty
